name: Georgia Southwestern Design Projects
shortDescription: During my time working at Georgia Southwestern State University I created numerous graphics, documents and other items for logos, advertisements and other marketing tools.  Below are some of the items I created, this does not include all of the items, but just a select few. Most of these items were created in Photoshop, InDesign and Illustrator.

quickFacts.Tools: Adobe InDesign, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator
